title: Agent
description: A canonical agent definition for AI assistants. Maps to Claude Code, Gemini CLI, Codex CLI, and Kiro CLI.

description.description: Brief summary of what the agent does and when to use it

instructions.description: Detailed system prompt for the agent with full guidance on behavior

tools.description: Tools available to the agent (e.g., Read, Write, Bash, Grep, Glob)

skills.description: Skills or capabilities the agent can invoke

dependencies.description: External CLI tools required by this agent (e.g., go, golangci-lint, schangelog)
